DOC.brief_summary: Randomized , comparative prospective study Conventional Endoscopic Mucosal Resection removal flat sessile colorectal lesion without previous attempt resection .
DOC.brief_title: Conventional Endoscopic Mucosal Resection v Underwater Resection Colorectal Non-pedunculated Colorectal Lesions
DOC.criteria: Patients age > 18 year sessile flat Colorectal Lesions ( measure 10 40mm ) , consent study Patients refuse participate study . Patients pedunculated , depress mixed lesion .
